entry.title: Thursday: Partly cloudy. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 55 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions.
